_88date.description: Date wraps both a rough date and an optional exact date.
_88date.title: Date

___exact.description: A day-precise date formatted as RFC3339.
___exact.title: Exact date

___bans.description: Cards that have been banned from Standard, ordered from oldest ban to newest. This array may contain bans from a previous rotation; you should filter them out based on the provided set `setCode` and that set's exit date from Standard.
___bans.title: Bans

items.description: A card currently banned from Standard.
items.title: Card

___name.description: The official English name of the banned card.
___name.title: Card name

___cardImageUrl.description: A URL to an image of the banned card.
___cardImageUrl.title: Card image URL

examples: Banned for being too effective a shutdown against counters to aggressive red (filling the board with small creatures and gaining life).
___reason.description: Human-readable description for why the card was banned.
___reason.title: Reason

___setCode.description: The set the banned card was printed into, specified by its `code` property.
___setCode.title: Set code

___announcementUrl.description: A URL to the page where Wizards of the Coast officially announced the card would be banned.
___announcementUrl.title: Announcement URL

___deprecated.description: Whether this API version is deprecated or not. Configure your software to notify you if this field is ever true so you aren't caught off-guard if this version is deprecated then eventually killed.
___deprecated.title: Deprecated

___sets.description: A superset of the sets in Standard, ordered from least recent release date (`enterDate.exact`) to newest. To get a list of Standard sets you MUST filter this array by comparing your local time to each set's enter and exit date, as the array by itself will contain sets that have already exited Standard as well as sets that have not yet entered it.
___sets.title: Sets

___name.description: The human-friendly name of the set, if known.
___name.title: Name

___codename.description: Pre-launch development codename given to the set.
___codename.title: Codename

$eref.description: Date wraps both a rough date and an optional exact date.
$eref.title: Date

___exact.description: A day-precise date formatted as RFC3339.
___exact.title: Exact date

___enterDate.description: The date this set enters or entered Standard.
___enterDate.title: Enter datetime

___symbol.description: A set of URLs to access this set's symbol.
___symbol.title: Symbol

___mythicRare.description: A URL to a set symbol in mythic rare coloring.
___mythicRare.title: Set symbol URL (mythic rare)

___common.description: A URL to a set symbol in common coloring.
___common.title: Set symbol URL (common)

___uncommon.description: A URL to a set symbol in uncommon coloring.
___uncommon.title: Set symbol URL (uncommon)

___rare.description: A URL to a set symbol in rare coloring.
___rare.title: Set symbol URL (rare)

___code.description: Wizards of the Coasts's official code for the set.
___code.title: Code

$eref.description: Date wraps both a rough date and an optional exact date.
$eref.title: Date

___exact.description: A day-precise date formatted as RFC3339.
___exact.title: Exact date

___exitDate.description: The date this set exits or exited Standard.
___exitDate.title: Exit datetime
